subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Trailing by 8  points late in the fourth quarter, Tom Brady rallied New England to a tying touchdown and put Stephen Gostkowski in position to kick the winning field goal with 1 minute 10 seconds left.
snippet: Trailing by 8  points late in the fourth quarter, Tom Brady rallied New England to a tying touchdown and put Stephen Gostkowski in position to kick the winning field goal with 1 minute 10 seconds left.
